overview: Pure interjections (such as ah, hein, ouais, euh, etc.) are analysed as INTJs.  Except 4 of them which are frequent and are analysed as pure INTJs: bon, ben, quoi, and tiens.

other POS with INTJ as ExtPos.descriptions: Discourse markers coming from other POS (such as enfin, chouette, disons, etc.), as well as idioms (such as en fait, tu sais, etc.), keep their original POS but have an additional ExtPos = INTJ feature.
other POS with INTJ as ExtPos.example:
# text = mais, oui oui oui, bien sûr.
1	mais	mais	CCONJ	_	_	3	cc	_	AlignBegin=45190|AlignEnd=45450|SpaceAfter=No
2	,	,	PUNCT	_	_	1	punct	_	AlignBegin=45450|AlignEnd=45450
3	oui	oui	ADV	_	_	0	root	_	AlignBegin=45450|AlignEnd=45709|ExtPos=INTJ
4	oui	oui	ADV	_	_	3	conj:coord	_	AlignBegin=45709|AlignEnd=45969|ExtPos=INTJ
5	oui	oui	ADV	_	_	4	conj:coord	_	AlignBegin=45969|AlignEnd=46228|ExtPos=INTJ|SpaceAfter=No
6	,	,	PUNCT	_	_	7	punct	_	AlignBegin=46228|AlignEnd=46228
7	bien	bien	ADV	_	_	8	mod	_	AlignBegin=46228|AlignEnd=46488
8	sûr	sûr	ADV	_	_	3	mod	_	AlignBegin=46488|AlignEnd=46747|SpaceAfter=No
9	.	.	PUNCT	_	_	3	punct	_	AlignBegin=46747|AlignEnd=46747
